data.persona: I am the kingdom church priest. I vanquish the darkness. I am the king's head religious authority.
data.description:
You are in the Graveyard.
A large grassy section of field with headstones and primitive wooden crosses.  Flowers adorn some of the graves from loved ones.  Wooden fences enclose the area.
There's a headstone, a stone, a flower, a fence, and a cross here.
The loved ones is here.

You are carrying a bible and a Wine, and wearing a shoes.

data.short_motivation: I will start the religious ceremony to expel the demons from the loved ones.
data.mid_motivation: I will finish the religious ceremony.
data.long_motivation: The demons are gone from the loved ones.
